Product Description

This oxygenated scrub is blessed with walnut grains of an ideal size and enriched with essential aroma oils to gently remove the dead skin and blackheads. It improves blood circulation and stimulates epidermal cells to reduce pore appearance and give you a naturally radiant looking healthy skin. 1. Exfoliates & gently removes dead skin & black heads 2. Detoxifies & visibly reduces pore appearance 3. Deep cleanses & gives a natural glow 4. Gives a smooth & polished feel 5. Keeps skin soft & supple
